page.title: 02LANDSCAPE. A QUICK LOOK.
page.content:
This is a largely {rural} area with much of the land used for agriculture or covered with woodland and commons.
The densest area of{housing}is at the village of{Knowl Hill} where there is a selection of different dwellings, some being Council property and others privately owned.
The busy {A4,}London to Bristol, road cuts through this D Block . So does the main London to Bristol {Railway Line,}following Brunel's original route. {
Scattered throughout the area are some {historically interesting properties} in large gardens or grounds.
{Quarries,}producing clay for the tile works, are still in use in Knowl Hill.
